pages.title: Climber
pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 3 $(li)Treasure = True $(li)Tradeable = True $(li)Rarity = Uncommon $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Allows you to climb in direct of looking on climbable blocks

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 100 $(br2)Shit-righclick a climbable block to fast travel to the most upper block. $(br)Please stand still meanwhile
